title: Taken By Force
description: TAKEN BY EROTIC STORIES OF ABDUCTION AND CAPTIVITYedited by Christopher PierceSTARbooks Press unveils its latest exploration into forbidden sexual territory with TAKEN BY FORCE, edited by CHRISTOPHER PIERCE, author of SLAVE and editor of MEN ON THE EDGE.DON’T LOOK NOW … SOMEONE’S COMING FOR YOU.Kidnapping. It’s the sexual equivalent of an extreme taboo, dangerous, misunderstood, a total mind-bend for both the captured and the capturer, and a rush of adrenaline and pleasure that no other erotic scenario can bring.Have you ever been kidnapped and held prisoner or fantasized about it? Have you ever kidnapped someone and kept them as a personal hostage or dreamed about it? You’re not alone. Christopher Pierce has dragged those taboo fantasies kicking and screaming into the light for your erotic reading pleasure. TAKEN BY FORCE plunges headfirst into this common but unspoken sexual domain, where possessing the man you want becomes worth any risk.This nocturnal world of danger and desire is a place that once visited will leave you changed forever.TAKEN BY FORCE features the erotic fiction Logan Zachary, Shane Allison, Mark Apoapsis, Jeff Mann, Hank Edwards, Rick Polney, K. Appleby, Lew Bull, Milton Stern, O.H. Fowler, and Wade Johnson, and the very disturbing story, CALVIN ROSE by John Caruso.
author: Christopher Pierce
